p: On fair emission quota, see e.g. Simon Caney, “Just Emissions,” Philosophy and Public Affairs, Vol. 40, No. 4 (2012), pp. 255-300; Christian Baatz and Karl Ott, “In Defense of Emissions Egalitarianism?,” in Lukas Meyer and Pranay Sanklecha, eds., Climate Justice and Historical Emissions (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2017), pp. 165-197; Olle Torpman, “The Case for Emissions Egalitarianism,” Ethical Theory and Moral Practice, Vol. 22 (2019), pp. 749-762; and Colin Hickey, “Climate Change, Distributive Justice, and “Pre-Institutional” Limits on Resource Appropriation,” European Journal of Philosophy, Early View.
